title: In your opinion, who is League current, worst Champion?
body: For me, it would have to be either {{champion:19}}  or {{champion:83}} . Both have a really useful ultimate, and then are kinda useless afterwards....

Well worst depends on what you're measuring.

For example, if you only want win rate to decide it, Nidalee is the worst champion.

"**In your opinion**, who is League current, worst Champion?"

I'm leaving it for you to decide, but, I based it off of usefulness.

Personally (and sadly this is coming from what was a Nidalee main) i would have to say Nidalee is one of the worst champions right now, she is basically snowball or your fucked in this meta and outside of her damage only brings a minor heal+AS Steroid to the table.

Even Warwick brings more with his 1 target Suppress + AoE AS boost along with the Vision passive for low health targets.

And while Yorick may not be meta, or liked, he is annoying to deal with due to his kit, like sure it's not great, but a Yorick can do a lot if you let the game drag on, and this is beyond his ult.
Actually you know what, I didn't even consider Nidalee... Just coz she gets played in high elo.... holy shit, she DOES suck. I did NOT even realise it
no she doesn't suck, hence why she is picked in high elo.
10/10 argument.....because everyone on every single team are skypeing and therefore are the only people who can set up a perfectly ez always successful nidalee gank.....kappa

1. {{champion:19}} Slow clear, poor ganks till 6, mediocre at best if behind, relies on your laners not losing lane before you get Sated. Once you lose jungle pressure from your laners you effectively become dead weight.

2. {{champion:3}} Barely anyone plays him to his fullest extent, Is Melee AP Long Ranged Caster Tank which makes little to no sense. Decent poke when built MR, useless against most AD Champs due to Passive.

3. {{champion:121}} Pretty weak the last few patches, doesnt do well in league of tanks, does worse due to Last Whisper nerfs. Can Still do OK against Squishy Carries 1v1.

She can snowball, but the effort she requires to do that is so crazy

{{champion:19}} and {{champion:83}} can carry hard, especially in solo queue. 
{{champion:44}} definitely offers the least to his team, the only thing that anyone can consider viable is a point and click stun and his outrageous auras. 
{{champion:28}} is the most reliant on snowballing, otherwise with neither side being dominant she'll usually be weaker, especially as a melee. 
{{champion:432}} and {{champion:40}} are similar to taric, but instead of innate tankiness they have just some more "niche" abilities. like they dont really work together that well but separately coming together and having those abilities on a single champion makes a good/decent support champion. if it werent for serious bard players like aphromoo i would think bard is too gimmicky to be considered anything besides a troll pick, but a 2 people stun of a total of 3.6 seconds is pretty effective i guess. magical journey and tempered fate also allow for great plays if used properly
{{champion:43}} has received too many buffs to call her anything less than good. the thing that people are probably frustrated with her about is there proper timings of her ult. even as a support the temptation to empower her Q is huge, but then she has 2 other empowerable abilities that can be even more effective for her team or against an enemy
{{champion:76}} is like early 2015 elise. she has a high skillcap, even for a jungler, but nobody can handle her nerfs well enough to successfully play and snowball well with her

I think what he is saying is that shes so easy to mess up with that she can be more hindrance then help

Warwick and Yorick CAN carry hard, epsecially in Solo Queue, the same can be said about every singe champion in the entire game though. I'm strictly basing this off of how much each of these champions can offer to their team at any given time, not how much a champion _can_ snowball and carry. Warwick has ONE CC ability but after that, is a lumbering pile of kiteable uselessness, as is Yorick except he has a revive-y ult rather than a CC one. In fact, the same can be said about Illaoi, but, because she has a tone of AOE, in comparison to WW and Yorick's purely single target focused kits, she's a little more useful.

Taric, has a targeted ranged stun on a basic ability's cooldown, that alone makes him amazing. You don't find many abilities like that in League, plus the aura he does provide is NUTS!

Evelynn's stealth alone makes her one of the scariest junglers to play against, you're in constant fear of where she is and when she'll strike next. Sure once she comes out of it stealth, her kit is kind of mediocre, with a measly aoe slow and nothing but damage after that, but her flank aoe initation slows combined with her early game pressure easily puts her above WW and Yorick.

Bard has a so much CC and utility for his team, I'm not even gonna bother saying why he's useful. And Janna still stands as one of the best peel supports in the entire game, her kit is great and disengaging and keeping her carries alive.

Yeah, Karma is great.

And I don't know man, Nidalee, is really good, much better than WW and Yorick if she's going even or is ahead, but if she's ahead, she offers even less than a WW or Yorick can to be honest... I don't know about Nidalee man, I'd honestly say she's in a bad spot at the moment, and, she's kinda useless if behind.
